explains: n. 现代主义；现代思想；现代作风

sentences.en: He was forcing the state to enthrone a particular brand of modernism.
sentences.cn: 他力推政府要尊崇那一套特定走向的现代化。

sentences.en: These by no means add up to modernism.
sentences.cn: 这些并不是现代主义的附加意义。

sentences.en: And modernism is all about verticality, from a certain Angle.
sentences.cn: 现代主义是从固定角度来看是直立的。
